description:
AFFILIATE MARKETING DECEMBER 2015

Do you want to tap profitably into the fast-growing AM industry?

If the answer is yes, then you are int the right place. This course is not a get-rich-quick scheme, the internet is already plenty of those. And they do not work.

At Oxford Learning Lab we only engage with professional that work with real businesses, so we bring years of expertise to you. All our Digital Marketing and Marketing Strategy courses have enrolled more than 12000 students.

This course is not different, chaired by Red Barrington, speaker, consultant and trainer for Affiliate Marketing businesses of all sizes and types for over ten years.

Whether you are a digital marketer or a small business owner, this course will introduce you to the fundamental concepts that will ensure any affiliate marketing programme success.

From this course, you’ll learn how you can successfully leverage affiliate marketing as a new sales channel to drive growth for your business. You’ll be able to understand and then put into practice the essential steps that large, global brands use to make their affiliate marketing programmes a success – plus valuable tips in getting it right that most never share.

  • You’ll learn how affiliate marketing can best be applied to your business so you can use affiliates to increase your online traffic and sales significantly
  • You’ll understand the critical steps in successfully setting up your affiliate programme
  • You’ll learn how to select the best affiliate network and how to launch an affiliate marketing programme successfully
  • You’ll know how to attract and recruit the best and most lucrative affiliates to your affiliate programme to increase your online traffic and sales

Affiliate Marketing: Skyrocket, your Leads Sales & Profits, works perfectly in conjunction with our Digital Marketing Management course.
title: Affiliate Marketing: skyrocket your Leads, Sales & Profit
